name: Sai
text: On Play: You may rest 1 of your {Dressrosa} type Leader or Stage: Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a Cost of 1 or less to the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: You may rest 1 of your {Dressrosa} type Leader or Stage: Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a Cost of 1 or less to the bottom of its owner's deck.

meta.notes: Card is a sample and has 'SAMPLE' text overlaid on the art. The printed ID is OP10-048, set OP10, number 48, rarity L, cost 3, power 5000, attribute Slash, types Dressrosa/Happo Navy, and no life value.
